article: One evening, Mr. Green was driving his car along a lonely country road. He had  _  $10,000 from the bank in town. Suddenly a man in rags stopped him and asked for  a lift  . Mr. Green told him to get on and continued his way.  _  he talked to the man, he  _  that he had just broken out of prison. Mr. Green was very afraid at the  _  of the money. Suddenly he saw a police-car and had a  _  idea. He  _  on speed and drove as quikly as possible. Then he found the police-car running  after  him. After a mile the police-car passed him and ordered him to  _  . A policeman came up. Mr. Green hoped to tell him about the trouble but the man put a gun to Mr. Green's  _  . The policeman said he wanted Mr. Green's name and  _  amd Mr. Green obeyed. The policeman wrote it down in his notebook and put it in his  _  . "You  _  appear at the police station," he said, Then he talked to Mr. Green about  _  driving. Mr. Green started up his car again. He had given  _  all hope of his $10,000, but as he reached a more lonely part, the robber said he wanted to  get out  , Mr. Green stopped and the man said , "  Thank you  , You've been  _  to me. This is what I can do in  return  ." And he handed Mr. Green the policeman's  _  , which was stolen while the policeman was talking to Mr. Green.
